lines.text: Sorry if I'm interrupting you, copper! Let's go back tot he old ways, huh?
Come on, be a good man. Remember this? I crapped it out for you?
Yeah, go on . Kill me. You and Ferrender are done for. This place is surrounded.
You heard him? He's still talking about Ferrender. You bloody fool! I killed him 3 months ago, arsehole! Who do you think it was at the morgue?
Who the fuck do you think it was?
Stop! Drop the gun. Drop it!
There are no suicide attempts this time, because I'll kill you myself. Like a wild dog.
[He takes Caputo's gun, and goes after Moretto, who is escaping, and corners him in a dead end, and yells loudly]
[Shoots him several times, killing him, and Moretto falls to the floor, firing one round from his handgun, and dies]

[Holds up a football score card]
Is it yours?

[Beating him up]
I'll make you forget women for the rest of your life, damn it! You fucking stupid son of a bitch! I'd like to see you do it again, you know!

[after arriving in the middle of a motorway, they stop]
Don't fuck about! Get out!
I'm not in this! She injected herself!
You fucking scumbag! You killed her! You showed
[Produces his Beretta M9 9mm and pulls the slide back and forth to chamber the clip and is ready to kill Tony]
Stop! If you save me I'll tell you something about Ferrender.

[Tanzi lowers his pistol]
OK. You don't know this, but Ferrender...
[is shot and killed from nowhere and falls to the floor dead]
Ah, Theodore, son of a whore. Good to know you!
